name: Greg Burch
text: This place has good pizza and a great atmosphere. Lots of cool things to look at located throughout the building as well as outside.  Located in downtown Mansfield so be aware parking could be hard to find. Fun place for the entire family. Live music on certain nights.

name: Justin Scaggs
text: Quirky place with great food selection, friendly staff and a laid back atmosphere. Responsible beer selection,wood fired stone cooked pizza, and plenty of parking make this a great choice! Do expect to wait 40-60 minutes for the pizza …More

name: Robert Niewiera
text:
Create place for good tasting pizza and a bev.
I always get the Buffalo pizza and have never been disappointed.
Even better now that there is more parking.

name: VanDella Menifee
text: Love this place! Great food great service! Attended the pre-event Luncheon for the #RunWomenConference

name: Lizzybeth Martínez
text: House pizza was awesome. Best of ingredients. Peefect amount of sauce and cheese was delicious. The steak and cheese calzone was awesome too. Will be back.

name: Bobby Breed
text: Heart of Mansfield, great outdoor patio, live music in season. We love the small town feel with a little mellow mushroom.

name: Carisa Pizzi
text: Came here to date night after the 3rd Thursday Chocolate Lovers Stroll. It was very good and the service was even better. Love the atmosphere of the place.

name: Zach Kelly
text: Our service was awesome. Made sure we had what we needed and always checked back with us several times. Got a calzone and it was pretty good, massive son of a gun too. Enough of a portion you could easily share it.

name: Mark Johnson
text: Fun family pizzeria with lots of choices.  Well worth a visit if you have the time--it's certainly not fast food. The wait staff is friendly and helpful.  The ambience is good, a bit on the dark side with lovely aromas wafting everywhere.  Parking is in back, so look around for it.  You'll appreciate Mansfield's cozy downtown.

name: Brittany Burleson
text: Great pizza! We haven't found one we do not like. Keep in mind that they make every pizza fresh including rolling the dough so on average a pizza can take 45-50min. So worth the wait! While you are waiting enjoy a nice cocktail! Highly recommend.

name: Kendall Borg
text: Better that your average pizza. Service tends to be a bit slow, couple that with the wood oven for cooking the pizza, plan on being here a while. Usually worth it though. If they could provide consistent service this would be a 5 star pizza joint. Several beers on tap will keep you happy while you wait though.

name: Ryan S
text: We've always had good experiences here. We did have to leave(our toddler wouldn't have lasted, ha), however, last weekend due to the wait time for the pizzas. We stopped in and after being sat down, our server did kindly let us know the …More

name: Kate Squire
text: Loved the pizza. It was cooked healthy and got a good variety of pizza. The decor was awesome too. The kids loved the giant kaleidoscope out front. I would highly recommend it.

name: Eric Mickett
text: The Mellow Mushroom is a great place to meet up with your friends and family . The staff are very friendly and helpful in creating the perfect pizza for yourself or for your family.  They have a great bar that you can relax at.

name: James Baldwin
text: Terrible experience! Ordered 1 large pizza and some garlic bread. There was literally only 2 other tables with customers. Had to ask when the bread was coming out as our appetizer after 20 minutes. The bread got to the table and was cold! …More

name: Christian Bagdon
text: My friend and I come here weekly, always getting a large mighty meaty. Always receive great service and a great pie every single time. The wait is always worth.

name: Bethany Bailey
text: They have redeemed themselves! They're are back to the quality we love! The food and service we're both awesome! So happy with the improvements from last time! Jessica was our server and she was fantastic!

name: April Luper
text: This is our third mellow mushroom and we loved it. This one is steam punk and very neat. The food was on point and the staff was amazing we enjoyed our waiter i forgot his name but he had black glasses dark hair great friendly smile. He was …More

name: Avram Neal
text: The pizza is really good. It's a bit more expensive than others, but worth it. The crust is homemade I believe. The cheese is very cheesy. I received a pretty good serving.

name: Jessica marie BANCROFT
text: Alejandro was our waiter. He explained the menu and was very prompt. Very friendly. He even took the time to take a family picture for us. I feel he's a great team member. Also a young kid named Justin had a conversation with us and told us …More

name: K vB
text: Love this place! They are allergy friendly and have a great choice of beers. They always strive to keep their customers happy.

name: Katie Bryson
text: My Husband and I ate at a MM in Tennessee (first time ever seeing one). When I found out there was one close to us, I was excited and asked the rest of my family to join us there, as we were going to announce our pregnancy to them during …More

name: Avram Neal
text: The pizza was amazing! It was super cheesy. The crust was pretty good too. It looked like it was all from scratch. It's a bit of a long wait, but it was worth it.

name: Sydney Bogan
text: This place was pretty awesome! Our waiter was super nice and funny. They accommodated my vegan requirements. The vegan food was really good! I suggest that you put veggies on your vegan pizza or else it could be a bit bland. All of their …More

name: George Mullins
text: Very impressive beverage (beer) and food menu. Much more than just pizza, the Swiss mushroom burger I had was incredibly tasty as we're the wedges. Great atmosphere and service. Wonderful experience.

name: Erin
text: Tasty as always- really scrumptious pizza with unique topping options. Crust is to die for. Pizza, apps, salads, calzones are all yummy. Every waiter I've had at this location has been wonderful. Parking lot is not big enough and it's not laid out very well. Parking is the most difficult thing here.

name: Joan Jones
text: We like Mellow Mushroom food and have always had great service at the Arlington location. however, we visited the Mansfield location yesterday and our experience was similar to other reviewers. We like the food still but when we came in, we …More

name: Nikki Caposello
text: This was our 1st time going & we absolutely loved it! Our service was fantastic & the food was delicious. The manager even came over to check on us & she was very friendly. I will definitely be back.

name: David Patton
text: I liked the place but the Calzone I had lacked taste. It was rather bland. The service was good and the employees friendly. First time I have been there and I will go again.

name: Jimmy Robles
text: Pizza is alright. Not worth the wait though. I still like to bring my family here from out of town because the areas is neat.

name: Elizabeth collins
text: The pizza is good but, I can't believe I'm going to say this, it comes with a little too much parmesan cheese. Their crust is unusual in that it is heavily seasoned. Sometimes, it's a bit much. The salads are great.

name: Joshua Kerr
text: Very nice, clean environment. Staff were all very friendly. Pizza was great!

name: J L
text: Wow!!!  Great food and have NO complaints.  I'm a big pizza fan and I could see myself just doing Mellow Mushroom forever.  I've had good pizza in N.Y. and great pizza in Chicago...this place won't disappoint.

name: Nicole Almaguer
text: I left my purse here last night and I had no idea it's a small clutch that I keep inside my big purse. The GM Rachel messaged me on Facebook letting me know that she had it locked up in her office and reassured me she was the only one who …More

name: Turbo Time
text: Let me start with the one negative thing first first-place was moderately busy took 35 minutes for us to get our pizza however.. once the pizza got to our table we forgot all about the weights honestly some of the best pizza that I've ever …More

name: Chad Irwin
text: The first time we went here it was super busy and the wait was about an hour. Recently we went and got right in. We had the pretzel bites as an appetizer which didn't taste much like pretzels. But they were good. And then we had two …More

name: Zach Ivey
text: Food is good but restaurant itself is poorly run. Employees do not wash their hands it appeared after going to smoke outside multiple times. No one wears hair nets in the back when handling your food even though their hair is well past …More

name: Robert Lee
text:
Yummy pizza. My kiddos loved the kids pretzels.

Service is not great at all. Very slow. Long gaps with not even a walk by. Even …More

name: Bryan McCullough
text: Used to be a one star but has improved immensely. Beer has always been good, food is much better. Keep up the good work for 5 stars!

name: H V
text: Even tho i had a not so good experience the manager took the time to reach out to me to apologize and even offer to pay for my next meal!! I told him that I appreciated it but couldn't accept it but that having him just taking the time to …More

name: Richard Ash
text: Great pizza Cooked over fire. Service after lunch was a little slow. Pizza preparation took a little longer than normal. Other than that, I highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Shawn Saleem
text: There pizza is really good and always fresh. The table service is okay but the servers are very nice. They did make a mistake on our order and took care of us very well.

name: Sheri Leggett Huebner
text: Their staff is so accommodating and friendly. Their kitchen manager, Matthew, is a true jewel in their crown of employees! Food was FABULOUS!!

name: G N
text: Samantha at the bar needs a raise. We came in at 9 in the evening.  The place was empty but we were told there would be a 15 minute wait...absolutely ridiculous. After about 10 minutes someone came and asked me if I was on the list. The …More

name: Samuel Vinke
text: Mellow Mushroom is always good. They have friendly staff but seems to be new people regularly, no problem with that though. The dough seemed slightly under baked, I got a calzone. It's still delicious and not a problem for me, I just like crispy bread.

name: T Mazlo
text:
I've only been to this location twice but both times we've had great customer service.
This time our waitress was very friendly and helped us pick out our drinks …More

name: Armin Rezaei
text:
Just like all other mellow mushrooms; simply put, not worth it.
Their food isn't nearly worth what u end up paying (especially their pizza) and their drinks are OK. Just drive 1-2 more minutes; there are much better places around.

name: Charlotte Johnson
text: Great place to get a very good pizza! Neat old downtown building makes for a great atmosphere. The meatballs were amazing !!

name: Paul Sherrill
text: This location is always extremely slow and seems understaffed.  I've been here a handful if times and you stand a 50/50 shot of your pizza being some degree of burned.  One time our food was burnt up so bad the manager on duty credited us …More

name: Uphld Thelaw
text: Wife and I went in about 3 PM on 01/15/18 as first time customers and no one took our drink order or said they would be right with us or anything. After deciding what we wanted from the menu that we grabbed from table over....... No one …More

name: Jayne Wilhelm
text: They have Gluten free options!!! It's so hard for my husband to find restaurants that understand gluten allergies. Building has great atmosphere and service was great.

name: Betty Anderson
text: Great food.  Terrible service.  Lucky if your drink is even refilled and your order is right. …More

name: Jerry McHugh
text: Service was very slow, waited almost an hour for two pizzas on a Sunday when they weren’t busy. They told the people sitting next to us (who ordered before us) that they were out of ingredients but then put those same ingredients on our …More

name: Mikka Easley
text: manager did not have any control over the staff, did not seem to care they were literally yelling, only one person was nice. waited 30 minutes for a pizza, ended up being burned.. so we would have had to wait another 25 minutes. we just …More

name: Aj Cosby
text: Kaylee greeted us with a big Texas smile and sat us immediately. Chris P and John H, were behind the bar slinging cold brews, great story's and serving up delicious appetizers. Ms. Lexy swung by and spoke with us. What a great spokesperson …More

name: Robert Doherty III
text: Phenomenal service tonight!  Chris was our waiter. He was excellent with our 3 & 2 year old kids. Meatball sub and everything else we had was awesome.  We'll definitely be eating here again. Thanks

name: Michael Ryan Hube
text: Very thoughtful service. My (pregnant) wife and I had dinner on the patio and they had the wherewithal to ask smokers to move off the patio area without us even saying anything. Otherwise gave me a great beer recommendation and attentive service.

name: Kayleigh Sweeney
text: The server was really on top of everything and the food was simply fantastic! We will definitely be going back!

name: Tray Traylor
text: This is a very cool place in a great location.  I’m not too hard to please, but probably my worst dining experience yesterday in over two decades with regard to customer service.  Though pricey, food was good on the last visit, which …More

name: suzy taylor
text: Usually known for great pizza. Last time we went it was a gong show. The place was empty. Or food took forever and some of our items were forgotten. Um.... I know this place is better than that particular night. But only 2 stars until I go back.

name: Timothy Bouldin
text: I actually enjoy this place a lot. Given enough time and patience, the food is good. All of the servers do a pretty good job. Emma is the best!!!!

name: Michael Landis
text: Mellow Mushroom is hands down our favorite pizza joint, and this location in Mansfield is excellent. The industrial steam punk decor is awesome, but it's the pizza that rules the show!

name: Sarah Stevenson
text: I have had multiple bad experiences here. I keep hoping it will improve but so far it hasn't happened. The pizza is okay but the service is slow and one time we came to see a show and waited for a table for 3 hours and never were served.

name: Jordan Williamson
text: Nice place. Good food. Employees do their jobs well and the ambience is chill

name: Magdalena
text: Love this place. Nice and friendly staff and delicious food. 😁

name: Eric Pinola
text: The resturant itself is very well built and decorated. The staff is a bit lacking and not the greatest. The food was pretty good for the most part. The booths are a bit uncomfortable for the amount of time we sat waiting on our food. …More

name: Raquel Vazquez
text:
Oh. My. Goodness.
Pizza that my body didn't feel guilty about eating. So so yummy and fresh!!!
Highly recommend  if you enjoy getting your taste buds slapped with greatness!

name: Arend Estes
text: Great experience. Great food.  Our surver Jared was awesome!

name: Rhonda Pennywell
text: The Avocado Hoagie was amazing! The service and staff were friendly and prompt...I'm definitely coming back

name: Jerod Parker
text: Hostess asked if a booth was ok, we said sure. First booth was dirty, along with the next both and many other tables, so we ended up crammed between two other parties at tables. Then after about 10 minutes of wait staff walking past us, a …More

name: Ignacio Gonzalez
text: Last few times I've been here  the food is either under cooked over cooked or cold. Not enough staff. Food has changed in taste. Time to move on to something else

name: Ron McCranie
text: Food takes FOREVER but it’s almost always good - once it finally gets to the table after 45 minutes or later.

name: Josue Supe
text: Went there last night with some friends for pizza and beer. The place was awesome, has some cool decorations, nice cold beer. The pizza took a bit to come out of the oven but it was well worth it. Def will refer and visit again.

name: Andy Weston
text: The mostly heavily stacked pizza I've ever had. Very friendly serving staff made me feel very welcome. Steampunky family friendly atmosphere and plenty of space between booths and other seating areas. A real find in Mansfield.

name: patty hofer
text: Higher quality pizza than the usual fare. Intriguing steam punk interior decor. Spotty service. Sometimes there's good wait staff, other times - slooow. Once I actually had to hunt down someone to greet us at the door, place appeared …More

name: Michelle Treece
text: Pizza was ok. Service a little slow. The pizza itself takes a while which is understandable.  Neat building and atmosphere, but a little too much money for what you get.

name: T P
text: Have to say they have some of the most unique and flavorful pizzas around. They used to do one with shrimp but got rid of it :( only reason I wouldn't give 5 stars is because 1) bring back the bayou Bleu and 2) in house service seems to always be lacking. If you're taking out though it is a can't miss!

name: Jensun Mathew
text: Food is great but service was not, our waiter was nice but we got our food before one of our appetizers (salad)  so we cancelled it after we told her that it never came. Cool restaurant design and fairly big place so wait wasn't too bad even on a busy day the pizzas were amazing though so worth the wait

name: Freddy Fuentes
text: The deep dish pizza is amazing! I'll turn down dominoes and pizza hut any day! Look for Isiah as your waiter! If you want an experience to remember! 3-6-18 is a day to remember.

name: Stephanie Bolton
text: Great food and service but the pizza takes time. If you are starving there are great apps to enjoy.

name: Jacob Sherwood
text: It's in a awesome location, it's so cool inside. Pricey for pizza but it's more than just pizza. It's great pizza.

name: James Tidwell
text: Great place to eat  but they will closed for awhile for construction

name: Angela Barfield
text: Although the restaurant was practically empty when we were there, it still took 20 minutes to get the bread that we had ordered and about 35 minutes for our pizza. The staff did not check on the table very often for our drink refills. The pizza was pretty decent.

name: Corrie Hermans-Webster
text: I love Mellow Mushroom! As someone who is allergic to dairy it makes me really glad to know I can eat pizza somewhere. So thankful for this chain!

name: Richard Wilson
text: Worst dining experience I have ever had in my hometown!   Took almost an hour to get our pizza and when it came some type of fluid drip in our pizza from the ceiling!!!!   We told the waiter and he said it had happened before and they just moved the customer!  Gross!!   Move out of Mansfield or get better service soon!

name: Tonya Davis
text: Pizza was great!  Tried something new this time. And Jerald the waiter was wonderful as usual. Thank you MM!

name: Matthew Hagee
text: Great atmosphere and amazing food. Staff is pleasant and welcoming

name: Jonathan Allen Michael
text: I take my family to this place a lot.  I grew up down the road and knew that spot to be the old police station from long ago, so it's a nostalgic corner.  Mansfield has always been home for my family, both at work and play, so we love …More

name: Riley Livingston
text: The food was delicious! Waitress and manager were down to earth and absolutely fantastic. Whoever was in the kitchen did a horrible job as far as timing and messed up every single order and timing. I sat there for over an hour before the …More

name: Michael Wyatt
text: This is my new pizza place. I don't see the need to go anywhere else any longer. It was that awesome!

name: Tim Pfeiffer
text: Beer selection could have been better but the pizza was pretty good.

name: Barbara Clement
text: Did a call in pick up order. AWESOME PIZZA.. went to pick it up being my 1st time there I walked in the main door. Found a young lady at the bar that greeted me with a smile, asked if she could be of some help. Told her I did a call in …More

name: Jenny Barta
text: So we tried this place when they first opened and waited almost 2 hours for a nasty soggy pizza. Well today we decided to give it another shot and this time we waited an hour for our food and my drink never got refilled. On a brighter note …More

name: Ashley Niewiera
text: Always delicious.  The wait is always long, but it's fresh and worth the wait. Usually the wait staff is disinterested, but we got a pretty great server this time. Really enjoyed ourselves.

name: Corey Roth
text: Seriously I don’t know how this place stays open. Their insistence on using minors as the prominent labor pool absolutely shows in the operations of this restaurant. While the food quality is usually good, the wait times here are absolutely …More

name: Jennifer Proffitt
text: GREAT food! Pizza  was DELICIOUS!! Wish we had one near us in Houston/Conroe/The Woodlands!

name: Robert ii
text: Good stuff. I don't like the high prices, but the food was good. Took about 40 mins for the food to come out. Not sure is that's a good or bad thing, although I kind of wanted it sooner. …More

name: Miesha McDade
text: First time here. Brought out the wrong food.  Very slow service. I had to find the waiter to pay. This may be a great spot, I just happened to go on an off day. I most likely won't be back.

name: Maury Shapu
text: Once we were seated, the waitress came right to the table for our drink order. The food order was taken quickly and it didn't take long before it was at the table. Service has always been very good here. We come sometimes at lunch or dinner.

name: Diane Wison
text: Food was amazing. Our waitress was very good. But she needed help. She was the only one waiting.

name: Caren C
text: My daughter and I walked in we had never been there before and when we came in the staff just looked at us and walked the other way. The food was a 10 if I could rate it a 10. We drove all the way from Fort Worth to try their food. So service was a 2 and the food was a 5 out of 5. Quality ingedients.

name: Doni The Don
text: It was okay. Pretzels were not good. Too sweet. The pizza crust was yummy. Over the experience was okay. The servers were really nice and intentive. Great look and atmosphere. My biggest negative is it too expensive for quality of the food.

name: Campbell Knight
text: I've always had excellent service, crazy beer selection and good fun with my family here! Definitely recommend this place.

name: Austin Wigley
text: The best pizza in Mansfield. True to their nature, this location is peculiar in its own right just like any of the others. Perfect for enthusiasts or casuals alike.

name: Jason Pavlovich
text: Good pizza but its pricey

name: Leslie Mendez
text: This place has very very poor service. The waiter 1st forgot to put in my order, 2nd the waiter finally brought my son's meal after waiting 50 min to get mac n cheese but did not give us any silverware to eat with and didn't check back on …More

name: Debra Fournerat
text: Loved the atmosphere! It has a kind of steampunk vibe. The food is pretty good, too.

name: Elke Haderlein
text: Definitely a must see and enjoy the varied Pizza styles. Atmosphere and Architecture is incredible.😊

name: Denise Dunn-Trakshel
text: Good pizza, great drinks. Very nice atmosphere!

name: Erin Arthur
text: Not enough steak in calzone..burger was good but meat a little dry. The atmosphere is very cool..steampunk..dark and cool!

name: Dallas Sports
text: I love this restaurant, the food is really good and the atomosphere is nice but the waiting time is so long, we waited 40 min for 1 pizza

name: Mia Gamboa
text: I live in Mansfield and haven't tried this Mellow Mushroom. Its a Tuesday night, noone in the restaurant and we sat in the booth for 15 min before the bartender had to come and help us. 2 waitresses passed our table several times NEVER ONCE …More

name: Stephen Scroggs
text: Great pizza! And an outstanding beer selection.

name: Joe Gonzalez
text: Bad experience. Slow service. Long wait. Overpriced for mediocre pizza. We found a hair in pizza crust.

name: Dauhnna Martin
text: Best. Pizza. Ever.  Get the buffalo chicken and be ready for your world to be rocked!

name: Charletta Breed
text: Love this place! Great food and a fantastic mushroom soup!!! Like the natural ingredients.

name: R Taylor
text: Nice people, good parking and good food

name: Thomas Lambert
text: The experience is one of a kind. Texas sourced art pieces and a jail converted music stage. The food is worth what you pay for and the service was excellent.

name: TashaRae
text: Overpriced for mediocre food. Good vegan options I must say. They treat their employees like crap.

name: Mansfield Boot Repair
text: Great food nice atmosphere lots of food and booze.

name: Whitney Weaver
text: We had a party in the boat room. Horrible service and not so great food. Other locations don't compare. This place really needs help. 20 minutes for drinks and we had to ask for cutlery and plates. Food was just nasty.

name: Robert Ardrey
text: We've been here several times and the service has been decent with one excellent visit. Tonight was the worst experience to date... …More

name: Martha Herrera
text: Excellent food.Takes a lot longer to get your order so maybe an appetizer would be a good idea. Our visit was worth the wait.

name: Renee Wooderson
text: The food is very good but the wait and service is slowwwwwww

name: Josh Bouldin
text: Great pizza. A bit high in price and long wait but worth it.

name: Rebecca Thompson
text: Great food and awesome vegan, gluten free, and vegitarian options. Staff was attentive and I very much enjoyed my experience. Stuffed mushroom was fantastic and so was the sangria.

name: Holli Marshall
text: Service is slow but worth it! Really care about their customers. Tonight they burned my pizza and brought me a new one free.

name: Christopher Quintanilla
text: Very good pizza and good lunch hangout spot. Pricy but you get the pizza you pay for. Always worth a trip

name: Casey Riggs
text: Pricey. I have tried this place 7 different times hoping it would get better over time. The pizza tastes great if you are willing to wait and hour and a half for your pizza during which time the staff continues to tell you your pizza will …More

name: Catina Johnson
text: Great tasting pizza but crust was burnt. New servers not trained

name: David Rogers
text: Neat atmosphere, good food, decent service... Took way long, though, and they didn't even seem that busy.

name: Mary Ellen Burch
text: I love their pizza! Kosmic Karma is my favorite.  I get a small pizza and I still have leftovers to take home. The crust is unique, but very tasty.  I have had several different pizzas from here, all of them are delicious, but the Kosmic …More

name: Jason Luper
text: Just recently my visit to the mellowmushroom i was double charged and have had hell in trying to get my money returned its been almost a week and nothing im very irritated and will no longer be a mellowmushroom lover. So beware of being double charged!

name: James Snodgrass
text: I work here. We take pride in our food quality in the kitchen

name: Veronica Strealy
text: Something's wrong with this place. It shouldn't take 1.5 hours for two small pizzas and an appetizer. Yes, the pizza is very good, but whoever is in the kitchen and running the place seriously needs to step it up. It's pathetic really.

name: Stasha Wood
text: The best brushetta/pizza I've had in years! We did not mind a 20 minute wait at all for it either, nor did our experience w/staff compare to other reviewers. We were greeted warmly and shown to our seat. Our waitress, payton B. was AMAZING....SWEET.....and on point! Thank you Payton!

name: Eli Ellison
text: My wife and I absolutely love this place.

name: Evan Adams
text: Great food, wait time was a bit much.  Willing to give it another shot

name: Shannon Wheeler
text: Great service.  Food was awesome.

name: Atul Bhatt
text: Great pizza and great drinks.  Fun atmosphere.

name: Deborah Matney
text: Pizza is okay. Service is amazing  (our waiter was). Sadly, it feels like a chain that's trying to come off as a local place of business.

name: Steve Woodlee
text: Excellent pizza, ice cold beer and the bar area is nice to watch a game.

name: John Lennonade
text: A great local pizza shoppe. If you're looking for a good pizza place; stop. You've already found it.

name: AB de Luna
text: Best pizza in town! Awesome staff as well!

name: sl1m: p1k1nz
text: First time here, didn't have a server but the cute lady in the bar took great care of us!

name: Debbie Russell
text: Enjoyed this place! Nice to have something a little different

name: Keitha Gregory
text: Our experience tonight was absolutely awful. We arrived at 6:00p.m. and after an hour and half of waiting, we  ended up leaving at 7:30p.m. without ever having received our pizza. On top of that, our waitress Denise obviously did not care …More

name: Texas Two Wheeler
text: Takes forever to get a pizza , and mine came out burnt and hard on the bottom. I had to scrape the cheese and stuff off the top to eat because I didn't have another 55 minutes to wait for another one . On a positive note ,they didn't charge me for it .

name: Destiny Batson
text: Thin crust pizza red mellow sauce vegan cheese banana peppers black olives & tofu in jerk sauce !!!! Best thing I've ever eaten. I got the small & it was 2 of my 5 meals for the day

name: Lukesterrules
text: Good service and very good food

name: Matthew Stack
text: A little pricey, but a great restaurant.  Huge beer selection. Funky decor in downtown mansfield.

name: Shelli Dickey
text: The service was excellent and the food was really good.

name: Jeff Miller
text: Food was awesome,  service was really slow even without a wait on Saturday night.

name: Felisha Harper
text: Not a fan of this location we came in during a super slow time, and we where served with slow burnt pizza and slow service. We won't even get into the 6 minuite wait for beer that I was charged for. This place is not worth the effort.

name: Lisa Brown
text: Once the place to be in Mansfield but over the past two years each visit is worse. The hostess today is pitiful. The overall service is sub par. Look for this Laplace tone unoccupied soon. Management- you lost a good thing!

name: Craig Stewart
text: Nice atmosphere, friendly staff and pretty good food here. Kind of surprised that Mansfield has a mellow mushroom.

name: Kevin Penney
text: Ordered a medium pizza which was halved with two of their specialty pizza types, but had tomatoes added to my half and the other side already came with tomatoes. For a medium pizza, $21.00. Ok, no problem, cool atmosphere. Pizza came out …More

name: Michael Ritch
text: Food was good, service was good. Eat here if you like pizza, nice selection of draft beers.

name: Jason Burch
text: This mellow mushroom is done in a steam punk theme. Extremely cool and their hand made pizza is great

name: Jo Fulkerson
text: Good pizza. Lots of options on the menu. 👍

name: Stephen Sterett
text: great place. better than tcu locale by leaps and bounds. sit at bar for best and fastest service. great craft beer selection.

name: Yvonne Rowe
text: Best pizza!!! Great waiters. Nice atmosphere.

name: Robert Rohm
text: Love the steampunk decorating the got goin here.

name: Rita Valles
text: Great place, cold beer and the best pizza on this side!!
